description:
Exposes the following information for use directly from MSBuild, C# and VB:
$(GitBranch), ThisAssembly.Git.Branch
$(GitCommit), ThisAssembly.Git.Commit
$(GitBaseVersion), ThisAssembly.Git.BaseVersion
$(GitCommits), ThisAssembly.Git.Commits
$(GitTag), ThisAssembly.Git.Tag
$(GitBaseTag), ThisAssembly.Git.BaseTag
$(GitVersionMajor), ThisAssembly.Git.Version.Major
$(GitVersionMinor), ThisAssembly.Git.Version.Minor
$(GitVersionPatch), ThisAssembly.Git.Version.Patch
$(GitVersionLabel), ThisAssembly.Git.Version.Label
$(GitVersionDashLabel), ThisAssembly.Git.Version.DashLabel

The generated code contains only constants, so it can be used to construct your own assembly/file version attributes:

[assembly: AssemblyVersion(ThisAssembly.Git.Version.Major, ThisAssembly.Git.Version.Minor, 0)] 
[assembly: AssemblyInformationalVersion(ThisAssembly.Git.Version.Major + "." + 
	ThisAssembly.Git.Version.Minor + "." + ThisAssembly.Git.Version.Patch + "-" + 
	ThisAssembly.Git.Branch + "+" + ThisAssembly.Git.Commit)]
summary: Access commit information from MSBuild and C#/VB code
title: Git Info from MSBuild, C# and VB
